description.value:
Frequency once per hour

You always have time for a joke or prank. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Create a Diversion]{Create a Diversion}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Conceal an Object]{Conceal an Object}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Hide]{Hide}. All creatures who witnessed your Fox Trick then wise up to it, becoming temporarily immune to your Fox Trick for 24 hours.
